thread.section_title: banggood 收到的点评内容 | 消费者对于 banggood 的点评意见 | www.banggood.com | 286 3
thread.title: Olivier

author: Olivier
title: Olivier
text:
I bought some items through their website and had no issue until now.
My ipCamera was promptly received but was not working.
First I contacted the chinese manufacturer by facebook and they were kind enough to make some test with me but not successful.
So I revert to Banggood which after some investigation were sorry about my problem.
They promptly refunded my Paypal account.
I thank them very much for their fast and understanding reaction.
